prajapathi gothamiya ashta gurudharma piliganimath samangama pawidi upasampadawa labimen budusamayehi bhikshuni sasuna arambauni.bhikshunin pilibandawa thorathuru pelapoth atuwa wansha kathawalin heliwana athara ema mulashrawalata anuwa kanthawa buddhimath wuwath edithara wuwath dhairya sampanna wuwath shraddha sampanna wuwath sthri bhawaya nisa athiwiya haki samajika gatalu pilibandawa budun wahansege dadi awadhanayata yomuwi thibimama kantha pawidi bawa pramadayata hethu wiya hakiya.
